primary_structure_type: very large flightless bird with long neck and legs
primary_structure_shape_mature: massive body on long powerful legs
primary_structure_surface: loose soft feathers, bare head and neck
primary_structure_color: males black with white wing and tail plumes; females grey-brown
key_differentiating_features: Long bare neck and small head
confusion_species_list: Rhea americana (Greater Rhea - smaller, South American)
sexual_dimorphism_notes: Males black with white plumes, larger; females grey-brown
